title: Hyatt
description: The Hyatt brand is recognized by its elegant and sophisticated color palette, which includes a mix of deep and warm tones like #6D6E71 (Gray), #BF5B20 (Copper), #006E96 (Teal), #8C8700 (Olive), #AD5F7D (Rosewood), and #D79100 (Amber). These colors have been chosen to convey a sense of luxury and comfort, aligning with Hyatt's position in the global hospitality industry. Detailed branding guidelines and color specifications can be found in the Hyatt Brand Guidelines document accessible via their brand management portal.
